Truck Preparation For Driving VR Training

Train your professional skills in Truck Preparation For Driving VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

In the VR simulator, you will learn how to proceed full preparation for driving of the truck with load. You will identify hazards in and around the truck, check the equipment, and test all necessary processes. You will use proper tools and have proper feedback such as sounds, tool actions and cooperation with co-workers.

Truck Preparation For Driving VR Training was developed for professionals by professionals (including NEBOSH certified HSE). It is suitable for a wide variety of workers.
